reason: The agent successfully opens the Files app. However, it fails to navigate to the 'Pictures' folder. Instead, it clicks on the "Images" option, which might not be the same as the 'Pictures' folder. The agent then attempts to select three images, but the screenshots do not show any images being selected. The agent clicks on the "More options" button, but the subsequent actions are not aligned with the goal of moving the selected images to the 'Important Documents' folder. The agent seems to get lost in the options and fails to complete the task.
